name: Truewind
headline: AI-powered Bookkeeping and Finance Software
description:
‚õµÔ∏è Truewind (YC W23) is AI-powered bookkeeping and finance software for startups.

ü§ñ Using GPT-3, Truewind captures the business context that only founders have, making accounting easier and more accurate. Through a combination of AI and concierge service, Truewind delivers a delightful financial back office experience, that includes:

+ Reliable bookkeeping with less errors
+ Detailed financial models
+ Built exclusively for startups
+ Fast, responsive expertise
tags: industry:fintech; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

### Reduction in Reconciliation Time
With smart workpaper automation, reduce the time consuming task of reconciliation.
### AI-powered Digital Accountant
A digital accountant to automate accounting tasks, built to augment accountants so you can focus on advising your clients.
An AI assistant to execute the month end close. A management tool with visibility and control. All in one platform.
Digital Accountant
Artificial Intelligence

### Standardize Reconciliationand Close
Standardize and streamline account reconciliations for a faster and more accurate close. 
Connect live data from your general ledger and supporting workpapers to ensure that your financials are always correct.
Faster Monthly Close
Accounting Operations

### Smart Workpaper Automation
Upgrade from static spreadsheets and manage your prepaid expenses, fixed assets, and more workpapers with AI.
Our digital accountant prepares the workpapers and manages your subledger, transforming your work from doer into reviewer.
Smart Workpaper

generated_description:
Truewind is a San Francisco-based startup that‚Äôs transforming bookkeeping and finance for other startups through its AI-powered software. Launched in 2022, Truewind is part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Winter 2023 batch and has been designed with the unique needs of startups in mind. The team currently consists of 12 members and is led by Group Partner Brad Flora.

Their mission? To eliminate the common headaches associated with bookkeeping by leveraging AI‚Äîspecifically, GPT-3‚Äîto grasp the context only founders truly understand. This means that accounting becomes not only more accurate but also far less tedious.

Truewind offers a suite of services that includes reliable bookkeeping, detailed financial modeling, and a digital staff accountant that operates round the clock. With over 500 five-star reviews, their platform promises features that minimize errors, standardize the reconciliation process, and automate a variety of accounting tasks. The AI capabilities allow for faster bank categorization, transaction absorption, and significant reductions in reconciliation times, which are particularly beneficial for finance teams with tight budgets and ambitions to scale quickly.

For those who have previously used Bench or similar accounting platforms, Truewind offers seamless integrations and support aimed at easing the transition. Their website serves as a hub for potential customers to explore different features, pricing plans, and user testimonials.

If you‚Äôre part of a startup and find traditional bookkeeping too cumbersome or error-prone, Truewind could be the tech-savvy solution you didn‚Äôt know you needed. To find out more about their offerings or to schedule a demo, you can visit their website at [truewind.ai](https://www.truewind.ai/).
